about_the_game:
LWT is a sensual relationship simulator where you need to balance between your love to Tracy, your wife and desire to your nanny called Lisa. Help Tracy with the household chores, take care of your baby, earn money and spoil her with your kindness. Rediscover the pleasure of sex and have kinky experiences with her.

BACKGROUND STORY

You and Tracy have been married for two years now, and four months ago, you welcomed your first child together, a little boy named Charlie.

Unfortunately, it had been a while since you both had sex before the baby arrived, and ever since then, it seemed like the two of you just kept fighting. To make matters even worse, the newspaper you were working for closed down suddenly and left you without a job.



But now there is light at the end of the tunnel. You got a writing gig for a big magazine, and Tracy seems proud and happy for you. The baby has become easier to take care of, and Tracy has shed off her post-pregnancy weight...including the wonderfully large breasts she still retains! You want to get back to the sex life you used to have with your wife.

Recently, Tracy has decided that she wants to go back to work, and hired a young nanny from Canada named Lisa who will be staying with you over the summer in Los Angeles while taking care of Charlie during the day.



It's a common arrangement: a university student desires to travel for summer vacation so they agree to live with a family in another country in exchange for food and lodging.

So this unbelievably attractive young lady from Canada will be living with you in Los Angeles over summer...and it's been months since you had sex

Features


- an unforgettable story to experience that will expand your sexual horizons
- fun and intuitive relationship simulator with non-linear action
- lots of interesting decisions to make, and 13 unique endings to achieve
- inspiring visuals full of kinky details with fluid 40-frame animations
- save slots, GAME+, unlockable sex scenes and an endings gallery for trophy hunters
- 100% uncensored with close ups on the intimate parts and great cumshots

YOUR GOALS


Be the perfect husband
Help Tracy with the household chores, take care of your baby, earn money and spoil her with your kindness. Rediscover the pleasure of sex and have kinky experiences with her.



Fall in love with the nanny
Spend time together, offer her fancy gifts, take advantage of every intimate situation and steal her heart. Meet her hot friend and flirt with them both. Yield to temptation.

Play with their desire for you
The more attractive you are, the better your chances for getting into their panties. So work on Justin's statistics, like in a RPG game, to become the hottest guy in town.

INCLUDED EXPANSIONS


The base version of the game already contains content from two expansions:





Tracy’s wildest side is there for you to encourage, or discourage. Will you encourage her fantasy about being with more than one man at a time? Will you take control of her and only let her do what you want her to do? When Tracy reunites with an old friend at the cabin, will you put him in his place, willingly share Tracy with him, or let Tracy and him treat you like a cuckold? The choices are up to you.

And now Lisa is hornier than ever before. Together with Sandy, she is ready to be more and more daring in trying to seduce you, more and more bold. If you decide to start a sexual relationship with Lisa you can keep it going on and on, fucking her all over the house while keeping a look out for Tracy.



On the weekends, when Tracy is away, there are amazing new possibilities for interactions with her. Invite her to the gym, go shopping, play with her by the pool or even take her the bed you share with your wife. Do you want to be true to Tracy, or do everything and anything behind her back? It’s up to you.

Justin's task is much more complicated than before – Can he keep everyone happy? Does he even want to? The temptations are everywhere, for everyone.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is full of erotic content designed for adult audiences. You're going to find here scenes including wife cheating, swinging, sex for money, NTR, cuckolding [optional], voyeurism, control and submission, plus much more.

  • Storage: 7 GB available space
